UnsortedGroup.Title: Unsorted
UnsortedGroup.Description: This is an unsorted collection of cards. Sort them as you wish.

Cards.Title: Save
Cards.Description: Save all the changes made to the document to the hard disk.

Cards.Title: New
Cards.Description: Create a new document - an empty file.

Cards.Title: Save As
Cards.Description: Save a duplicate copy of the document.

Cards.Title: Cut
Cards.Description: Cut the selection and put it on the clipboard.

Cards.Title: Copy
Cards.Description: Copy the selection and put it on the clipboard.

Cards.Title: Paste
Cards.Description: Paste data from the clipboard to the current document.

Cards.Title: Settings
Cards.Description: Configure the settings of the application.
